Title: Relates to prohibiting smoking in multiple dwellings constructed after January 1, 2022 in certain cities
Summary: Prohibits smoking in multiple dwellings constructed after January 1, 2022 in cities with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd §§1399-o & 1399-q, Pub Health L; add §85, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the multiple dwelling law, in relation to prohibiting smoking in multiple dwellings constructed after January 1, 2022 in certain cities
